name: Issue2
description: Issue2 is a Text Based, Single Player, Strategy game where you decide how your story will be played out. During the game will you forge the legend of your hero, which will live on for centuries to come. Along your way you will be met with mini games that will help you in your story. The story of your legend won't be easy to find, you have to make the right choices to get your story going by writing the decisions you make. The story isn't just decided by your decisions, it's also is up to you to win challenges that occur during the game. Depending on how well you do, will depend on how your hero will do during the forging of the legend.
